JGAL

Class GAL_Chromosome

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_Chromosome
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<GAL_Chromosome>

    public class GAL_Chromosome
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<GAL_Chromosome>
    The GAL_Chromosome represents any kind of Chromosome

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(GAL_Chromosome other)
        Compares two GAL_Chromosomes objects by their fitness
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<GAL_Chromosome>
        Parameters:
        other - The GAL_Chromosome to be compared.
        Returns:
        the value 0 if this GAL_Chromosome fitness is equal to the argument GAL_Chromosome fitness; a value less than 0 if this GAL_Chromosome fitness is numerically less than the argument GAL_Chromosome fitness; and a value greater than 0 if this GAL_Chromosome fitness is numerically greater than the argument GAL_Chromosome fitness.
